choices: Stay focused and touch down on Oldale. (stay in Hoenn)
Track the mysterious flying Pokémon. (head to Sinnoh, Unova, Kalos, or Alola)
12523.content:
Note: All paths for regions past Hoenn (that is, Sinnoh, Unova, Kalos, and Alola) start here.

The morning air blows past you as a warm wind while you hover in the sky. Gently swaying back and forth, you get accustomed to this newfound ability to fly, at least, it feels like flight to you. You envision yourself ascending in your mind's eye, and your body follows; you arch backwards, letting out a small holler as you pull a loop in midair. This is actually happening. You're flying!

Euphoria fills every corner of your body; whatever power has brought you to the skies above Hoenn has also granted you the ability to fly. It makes it a lot easier to travel, you think to yourself, and it's a simple as thinking what you want to do, a practice you put to good use as you level yourself, parallel to the ground thousands of feet below. With your arms at your side and your legs tucked together, you twirl about in the air before blasting forward, leaving a sonic cone in your wake.

High up in the stratosphere, clouds are burst as you charge through them, reducing them to mist. Your heart begins racing as what was once a gentle breeze becomes an intense wind buffeting you as try to experiment with your flight capabilities; you tilt your body to the left and careen westward. Again, to the right, and you begin curving in the opposite direction, before streamlining your body and diving closer to the ground, where you see the small town of Oldale becoming clearer and clearer. What also becomes clearer, however, are a number of flying Pokémon, a group of Swellow, the regional birds, a fact you see just instants too late as you plow right into the path of an oncoming flock of Swellow. Many of the birds scatter, but your reflexes are quick enough to reach a hand out and snatch a few feathers off one of them. You quickly pocket the feathers, knowing full well what to do with them once you find someone to use them on. And why stop there, you think to yourself? You can fly, and with flight comes a lot more possibilities to satisfy your fetish...

A massive creature, however, cuts your list of ideas short as it barrels past you. You tumble in the air quite ungracefully, arms flailing about wildly, before forcing yourself upright, seeing a giant shadowy mass heading towards the horizon. You ready your body to give chase to it, but a few of the Swellow catch your eye, following their path as they soar above Oldale. Your mind becomes conflicted; you wanted to go to Oldale and the Hoenn region at large, but that thing, whatever it was, clearly hailed from another region. And a new region means a new set of women to meet and get to know. Stay in familiar territory or head off into a new land? What to do, what to do...
12523.title: The Joys of First Flight

choices: May, the regional heroine and new champion.
one of the Hoenn gym leaders stopping by for a visit.
125231.content:
It was tempting, but if you followed the Pokémon, you'd be missing the point of coming to Hoenn in the first place, actually seeing its women and worshiping their feet; besides, if it arrived here once, it's a fair bet to say that it'd return sometime in the future, meaning you'd have more chances to explore new lands. No, better to stay on track. You check the ground below to make sure nobody's around to watch you touch down; a flying Pokémon would be nothing new, but just imagine the kind of furor it would make seeing a person soaring around. Luckily, the coast is clear. The town almost looks abandoned with how no one is present outside or in the neighboring route; allowing you to start your descent. You close your eyes and take a deep breath before you gently float to the ground, your clothes ruffling in the wind as you descend. Already, you know the exact point you want to reach, and as the clouds part at your arrival, your destination becomes clearer; a well-worn patch of land directly in front of the northwestern house.

Your descent takes about a minute to fulfill, and you feel a bit lightheaded as you touch the firm ground at the edge of the house. A second breath fills your lungs with the crisp clean air of Oldale Town, almost enough to steady your nerves as you prepare to knock on the door. As you hear it open, however, you quickly retract your fist and take a gasp of surprise as you end up staring someone in the face, a someone who turns out to be...
125231.title: Welcome to Oldale Town
